name: Billy Bob
text: I bought some juice from Victory Vapors, as well as a second hand 150w Sigelei mod. On the first hit, something strange happened. My biceps became freakishly huge, shredding the sleeves on my shirt. Excited, I hit the button again, but this time, I felt a strange sensation in my stomach. My once hairy and flabby stomach transformed into a ripped Taylor Lautner level 8 pack. Hell, it was a 12 pack. On the third hit is when the magic really kicked in. My car transformed into a 1969 Pontiac GTO Judge, and I completed my transformation into a bald eagle and drove that Judge straight into pussytown. -Results are not to be expected.

name: Amy Headrick
text: Super awesome customer service! I was taken there by an established customer and the guy working actually went out of his way to give that customer reward points for bringing me in. The shop was very clean, nicely set up, and has a self help test bar with penguin vape cartridges. They also sell custom vinyl decals for your Vapes. He had a mix of customers, including a family with small kids, come in. Definitely worth a visit if you're out that way.

name: Drew Courson
text:
The staff appeared to know a lot about their products but that's about all I can say. If you expect customer service and a professional dealer, look somewhere else. A Micky Mouse operation at best. I purchased a highly recommended product from the staff telling me about the high quality of the brand.  The unit failed within 6 months.  When I brought the product back they refused to exchange the unit and didn't offer me a discount to purchase a new unit.  They literally laughed when asked them to exchange the defective product.

They did try and contact me a few months after this review. I didn't respond but I have visited their store a couple of times. Changing from 2 star to 4 star.

name: Amanda Johnson
text: The staff are friendly and extremely helpful. They go above and beyond to make sure you have a nice experience. They will continue to get my business. I recommend this vape shop to anyone.

text: Excellent customer service!! They didn't have any premixed juices that I liked so they mixed me up some and it was perfect!!

name: Andrew Brooks
text: The store is clean and they have a good selection of equipment and juices. The guys behind the counter are not necessarily the most experienced Vapors but will usually try their best to help you find whatever you are looking for and are usually all pretty friendly. I have ran into a couple of the salesman here that really didn't know much about vaping but try to pass themselves off as experts which usually tends to be a little aggravating to the more experienced vapors that are they're looking for particular things and a Salesman tries to tell them that they are wrong about what they're wanting. The only real bad thing I can say about this place is the prices tend to be way overpriced especially for people that are trying to get into vaping. It's not hard to spend $150 on a new setup here where you can get it for around 75 to $80 somewhere else.

text:
I'm an older guy, and when Nebulous Vapors first started, Micah was a great guy who explained stuff, and got me straight on vaping.
After that, it seemed like a little club that made me uncomfortable when I would go in to buy juice...customers were just sitting there and staring at me, like I was invading their space.
When they moved to Atlanta Highway, it just turned into a head shop and the people there couldn't give a rat's ass about anybody new. I sent someone there based on my experience way back when with Micah, and I had to apologize profusely to her for sending her there.
I would NOT recommend this place to a new vaper now, noway, nohow.

name: Margot Hamilton
text:
Concening the Spanish Fort store:

Bought two batteries right before Thanksgiving and left town. Neither worked. I went to the store to take them back and get replacements after returning later and they would not accept the return. They said it was more than 10 days and the manufacturer will not accept the return. I explained I have been shopping there since the store opened. The clerk even called the regional manager, after I insisted, and she said the same. I told her I would tell everyone about this treatment and they have records of my patronage and purchases- probably amounting to thousands of dollars since they have opened. Plenty of purchases for myself and others over the years as well as referrals. No more, I will let everyone I know to tell everyone they know to ban this store. The store lost thousands of dollars of income for about 40 bucks or less. Ignorant people. In addition, when I told the clerk one of the batteries came apart she asked if I had pulled it apart. She was implying I had caused the damage. Really!!!!!! The other battery simply never worked at all.

name: Tanya Haynes
text: Only gave 1 star because it makes you chose something. I have had several  BAD experiences at this shop. The “manager” or “owner” or whatever he is has been rude and disrespectful that I have witnessed on multiple occasions. I’ve always minded my own business. Now after this last encounter with him I would NOT suggest ever taking a phone there for repair. Swore he could fix my son’s phone and he said that it just needed a new screen. He was certain that was the issue and swore he could fix it. He was asked specifically “Are you sure it just needs a new screen? I don’t want to spend that much money when it might be cheaper to buy a new phone, if there’s a chance that you may be wrong and the screen isn’t the problem.” Nope! It’s the screen and he can fix it and he backs up his work. So.... okay cool. But.... after picking the phone up and paying him $100 bucks I got home and the phone would only work sometimes. Sometimes is a very generous stretch. Went back and he refused to even look at it but after persistence and the phone being laid down on the counter he picked it up and handed it back saying that it’s a “Mother Board” issue without even looking at the phone and so he refused to back up his work. So I left that store with a non working phone and a hundred bucks wasted! Wouldn’t go back in there if my life depended on it!! Most Arab businesses are great establishments with exceptional customer service and are usually very pleasant to their customers. I am thankful for those businesses. I’m sure Mr Rude is not from or maybe even hasn’t lived in Arab for very long, if he even does live here now. However, the young guy that works there is very helpful, polite and courteous. He’s probably the only reason people shop there. I give this place Negative 20 stars and will NEVER waste any more money there. FYI...took the phone to another repair shop and he said no way this person knew what he was doing in replacing the screen. The bracket that holds the connector secure was missing. He said it can’t work without the connector. He did fix the phone! Put a bracket in to hold the screen secure and it works great! He only charged me ten dollars.

text: Mostly like this place, they're close to home and have fair prices, but I am a little bit frustrated. Nowhere on the building do they have hours of operation marked, so when I stopped by at 8 this morning and saw the sign flashing "open," I thought I would try the door. It was unlocked, so I went in, thinking the guy was in the back (he usually is every time I've come by.) Next thing I know, the alarm is going off, and nobody is coming out to do anything about it. So I go back to my car and Google their hours, thinking "surely, with an open sign flashing and both doors unlocked, its within business hours," but I find out it's an hour before they are open. So I went home. Hours should be posted on the building, and it seems pretty unwise to have your front doors unlocked when nobody is there

name: Leah Rasbury
text:
Went in to buy a standard battery. The guy that helped me was nice and showed me a few batteries of different colors. This is why I gave even two stars instead of one. Decided on a color and payed.
This was a Thursday evening. This battery was for my mom who lives 2 hours away. So Friday night I give it to her and it doesn’t work whatsoever. The light doesn’t come on, no light to show battery is low- nothing. She charges it all night and on Saturday still nothing. On Sunday I call magic vape to let them know it never worked from the get go. He tells me he can’t give me my money back, which is ok but he wouldn’t even exchange it for one that did work. His reasoning was he couldn’t confirm I didn’t break it and was just trying to get another battery. He also said it could be the charger, after which I told him the charger worked fine.  He said if I would have returned it that night or the next morning, maybe. Which makes no sense. Wheather it was the next day or three days later. I assumed it would work since it was brand new out of the box. That’s just bad business. And I will NEVER shop there again. How can you not refund or AT LEAST just exchange a $10 battery that was broken right out of the box. So my mom goes to the vape shop in her hometown and buys an identical battery- and guess what...uses the same exact charger as she did on the first and this battery works great! She paid double but I’d rather pay double than use magic vape again!

text:

I work on the road and travel the entire south east and there prices are high in comparison to places i have been 50 different stores.for example a certain brand of juice THE ONE  is $8.00 cheaper right up the road.  One sunday i had busted up my mod and needed a new one asap which is one great thing about this store it is open on sunday. The reward program does not always makes us the better value, sometimes it does, but it does keep us very competitive. Our main focus is providing excellent service, do we still deserve 2 stars?

name: EagleLogic
text: There is only one place in town I go for my vaping needs and that is vape escape. This location recently opened and it is top quality like all the vape escapes are. They offer a wide variety of E-Juices, vaporizers, coils, even CBD e-juice additives now! The employees are all excellent as well. I’ve never met a rude employee at any of the vape escapes. They’re also very honest. I’ve been to vape stores where they push the most expensive device on you or devices that they need to kill inventory on. You won’t run into that here. The prices may appear to be slightly higher than average, but it returns well with the friendly and honest employees and their rewards program. HIGHLY RECOMMEND ! 5/5!

resp.text: Eagle, thanks for taking the time to leave such an informative review. Our focus has always been to take care of the customers first and the customers will take care of the business. We thank you for your business. Happy Vaping!

text: Only reason I'm doing three stars is the selection is so small for vape juice. But the lady working was amazing and sweet.

resp.text: Thank you for your rating and review,  Katy.  Sorry we didn't have a flavor you were looking for.  However, we do offer over 70 flavors of e-liquid and as more and more manufacturers go out of business due to FDA, PMTA Compliance and PACTACT requirements, it's going to get worse for local vape shops.  The flavors we carry are selected by our customers.  And if you want us to try to bring in a flavor or two you enjoy, just give us a call and we will do our best to bring it in for you, especially since shipping to consumers is no longer an option in the USA.

name: Melinda Looney (Zombieminna)
text: Love this shop! Knowledgeable, professional, and very friendly...spent a long time explaining different setups, ejuices, prices with me and then signed me up for a return customer reward app and I also get texts with special $ or % off of equipment or ejuice. The hours are fantastic and they seem to be open when everyone else is closed. It was definitely the customer service and friendly atmosphere that won me over and made me a repeat customer.  They remembered me after my first visit and made a point to ask how it was working or not (lol!) for me and I knew I would be ready to buy a more expensive setup than my original purchase. If you are looking for quality products and an owner who is only willing to sell what he knows will last a reasonable amount of time. They show you each step of the maintenance for your setup and if you forget like I did (oops..lol!) they will show you again. I like that they offer smaller bottles of ejuice here, bc I am not one to buy a huge bottle and put a lot of $$$ into it and it not be what I needed, wanted, or liked. Prices are very competitive and affordable. I definitely recommend checking out this little gem of a shop. Last time I was in they were expanding and adding a health foods side, where you can get protein powders, etc. There is of pride in what the owner does here and it shows. You will not be sorry you check this place out!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to rate and review our customer service, products and your shopping experience.  We really appreciate the thoughtfulness and integrity of your review.  When competitors and their employees attack us with false reviews it's nice to hear from the real customers we serve everyday.  We are grateful and will continue to strive to always improve on delivering an excellent customer experience.  Thanks again.

name: Jarian Reed
text: Once i made the choice to stop smoking Cahaba Vapes was my first stop due to the fact that it was in the area.  Soon as I walk in I was presented with a warm greeting as if I had been there before.  Needless to say the customer service was excellent.  When i explained what i was trying to do the staff was readily available to answer questions and also very knowledgeable.  There were several options for devices and flavors to choose from in the store.  Since, i have definitely established a trustworthy and wonderful relationship with the staff at Cahaba Vapes.  Not to mention that I went to another store for juice when Cahaba Vapes was closed and ended up being sick from the other store mixing juice improperly and having to much nicotine (wanted only 6mg).  Once Cahaba Vapes was back open I went by and told them what happened and how I felt and  the staff informed me of the signs of nicotine poisoning and also had it posted in the store to inform customers.  Needless to say there is no other Vape shop that i go to.  They saved me from a doctors visit that could have really been bad.  I thank the entire staff for everything and I have been vaping going on 3 months consistent.  (Mike you and your staff are the real MVP's)

resp.text: Thank you for Rating and Reviewing us, Jay.  We appreciate the honesty and integrity of your review.  Our goal is to always provide an excellent level of customer service coupled with knowledge and facts to every customer.  Thank you so much for the opportunity to serve you and your continued support.

text: Vaping sucks

They allow anyone without verifying their purchase history with our store to opine.  Michael

(I do work here now)
When i first walked in 3 years ago i felt at home and at ease. The friendly and knowledgeable staff and owners answered all my questions and then some. I have been a repeat customer ever since then. The laid back atmosphere is perfect. It's a small store but it feels more hands-on with one-on-one relations with customers. I loved it so much i bugged them till they hired me on :).

name: Clayton S
text: I am a little biased because I work here. The owners are awesome and really into helping people get off cigarettes. We have one of the largest selections of e-liquids in the state and try to stay up-to-date with all the new advancements in technology.

name: Andre Williams
text: The staff is very helpful and they are easy going people. You feel comfortable when inside the store and not in any way rushed. These guys also know what they're talking about they are not some guys who just threw up a shop based off popular demand. They've done their research and do what they can to help you save a buck whether it's their rewards program, discounted items, or ways to help you increase the life of your vapor and how to make your vapor juice last. You won't find a better shop than this one.

name: ronnie couch
text: The place doesn't have a whole lot at the moment because they had a bad summer and business is just now starting to pick back up. But everything is reasonable priced and the staff are always the best. Patient and helpful and try to go the extra mile for you like writing down e-liquids you'd like to have, ordering ecigs, and putting down notes to order stock you want.

name: Kimber Parker
text:
I've been going to the store for more than 7 years before they were even in Northport. The customer service and attention to detail is incredible. I have tried other shops but Nuway's in-house juices have me obsessed.

The owners are incredible badass women - if you're into supporting that kind of thing 😉

The staff is not going to try and upsell you. The pricing is fair. The juice might be higher than some other places but it's totally worth it. The staff will get you what you need/want and they don't mind helping you if you're undecided. They will honor manufacturer warranties and defects if something should malfunction. I've only had to replace one factory coil and they were very quick to handle the issue.
The staff wants to get to know you. They will help you if you want to better understand a product (especially if you're new to the experience). If you're a long-term customer and need that special order they've got you covered there too. I love it here. I haven't found another shop in town that comes close to matching this one!

text: I've been a patron of Nu-Way for months. I haven't been anywhere else, but I've never wanted to try anywhere else. No need or desire to. So, the only place I go for any vaping needs is Nu-Way (Northport, AL location). Fantastic staff/employees, with EXTRA-special kudos and thanks to Travis and Joey. Really good people.

text: Buy all my hardware and have it serviced here. Travis the manager is awesome!

text: Very knowledgeable, helpful, and friendly

name: Tyler Smelley
text: These are my people! I stopped smoking about six months ago and never could've done that without Travis, Michael and Tiffany. Over the course of those six months, I've become a regular and I've witnessed the staff take such a heartfelt interest in their customers on so many occasions. Every single member of the staff is knowledgeable and wants to truly understand the needs of their customers. They EXCEL in helping those new to the vape world transition from smoking to a less harmful occupation, and they have such patience with the beginner! Nu Way also has their own Juice Lab (in North Alabama, I believe) so the micro-chain controls their own QC and production for their juice selection. I'm a consistent fan of their OGVB or Original Very Berry and vape it almost exclusively. I also take advantage of their Loyalty Program and routinely special order the larger volume bottles of juice from the lab - both are great values! The shop also has a great selection of gear including a wide variety of coils!

name: Mason Allen
text: Great vape shop one of the best if not the best vape shops in Tuscaloosa! They are always stocked on products and if they don't have something you need they will go out of their way to get the product you need. They don't try and make sales they try and help people stop smoking and choose a healthier lifestyle. Will be back for more vape supplies in the future

text: Love TJ's juice, ask for Travis

name: Megan Brand
text: My first experience at this shop was outstanding. The lady who helped me was outrageously kind and personable.  She even cleaned my eVic for me!!! Unfortunatly, I am not knowledgeable with any of the products for this vape considering I have only had it for a month and the place I originally bought it from did not tell me much information except to read the manual. The lady took the time to explain EVERYTHING to me. Another perk to this shop is they keep track of your purchases and after you buy 10  bottles of juice, you get one free! I have been to other shops and none of them offer any form of discount for shopping with them. I would suggest this shop to everyone.  This shop has a great atmosphere, good people, and positive vibes!! I refuse to go to any other shop.

resp.text:
Hello Mary,
I'm very sorry to hear you got overlooked when you were in our shop.  We try very hard to treat our customers like family, and I apologize that is not the experience you had with us.  Please stop by anytime and allow us to try and make it right.

Sincerely,
Sterling
Nu Way Vape

name: Drew Robinson
text:
Poor selection, high prices.

Decent customer service, but nothing to write home about. The juice I purchased was junk, underflavored and not quality juice. Their lines aren't anything special. Don't go there looking for a line you know of or heard about, they won't have it.

resp.text:
We are sorry Drew that you didn't find a juice you like however all the brands we carry are premium ejuice brands. 80% of them are brands you can find at every vape shop across America.

We do not manufacturer ejuice so of course we cannot, like any other vape shop, guarantee that you will like the ejuice you tried.

But I will guarantee that there is at least 10 flavours of ejuice on our shelves that you would fall in love with.

We would like to correct this if you give me a call 2058958852 at your earliest convenience.

Also we strive to keep our prices the lowest possible.

If price point was the issue we sell 120ml X2 for $29.99.

A store can have the best products around town... but without people like Jersey... they won’t keep customers. Thank you, Jersey, for always being so kind to me. name: Jamie Mook
text: My husband just got out of the military so we have lived in a lot of different places. I haven't found many vape shops that I really enjoy going to. I have really bad anxiety- so it's hard to find that comfortable place with the right people. I was bummed to leave NC and the vape shop I had been going to for years. When I first arrived here I went to several in the surrounding 20 miles or so. And either they had no selection at all, horrible customer service, outrageous prices, or whatever reason not to return. This little cozy spot has everything a great vape store should. Great selection  of juices, always have the coil I need, and best of all the best customer service! I'm not sure what her name is but she is awesome! She doesn't make me anxious at all. She is always very nice and doesn't rush me out the door. I really enjoy this place and I am so glad they are here👍👍👍👍👍

name: Michael Alter
text:
I am somewhat new to vaping so like most people I asked friends about the best places locally to shop for ejuice and supplies. Following a recommendation I checked out e vapor shop. Found the staff friendly and helpful and found an "atomic Fireball" ejuice that was excellent tasting vaped really nicely.
After purchasing this flavor and several others I was happy Happy Happy!
The fireball is an extreme flavor  and I can not vape it all day so it was on the shelve with many other juices that I like. A few days pass and I feel the urge for a fireball and when i pick the bottle up I notice that it had actually crystallized in the bottle. doing some web searching found a solution and tried it but that didn't really work out as i had hoped. I returned to the EVAPOR SHOPPE and asked them about the problem and after looking at the ejuice the young man there apologized and stated that the store policy was no refund or exchanges. So I am stuck with a 30ml bottle of God knows what and they didnt give a rats a** at all. BUYER BEWARE! Plenty of shoppes in the area so I will never do business at this one again.

text: I previously bought a smok stick v8 kit from them. Which,  a few weeks later, I began experiencing problems with the battery. After they inspected the kit and determined that the battery was defective, they replaced it with a Eleaf istick picon and told me to keep the tank that came with the smok v8 because it can be used on other mods that I may desire to purchase in the future. Therefore, I'm greally satisfied with the service that I received and recommend everyone interested in vaping to make 205vape your store of choice. Oh, tell them that  Steven Dudley sent you and you'll receive a great discount on your purchase.

name: Charla Evans
text: I like to support local businesses.. HOWEVER, Last time I stopped by because my mod wasn't working. An employee told me it was because I needed new coil. I bought coils .. still not working. He said what you really need is new battery. I bought 1. When the other employee started to replace battery he said.. Ohhh you had battery in upside down.. I said Then I obviously didn't need the items I just purchased did I??. He assured me the battery I bought was superior to the 1 I had. I was very upset and frustrated. I said ok whatever.. And started to leave the 1st salesperson told me I couldn't put  my original  battery in my purse..That it would explode.  He said just give it to me ..I'll dispose of it for you.!!!! I was so frustrated and upset by then I wasn't thinking clearly.. There was nothing wrong with my battery Except I had it in upside down! I'm not an expert I am a vaping newby.. As you can tell by my above statement. The employee also knew I didn't know what I was doing.. He sold me things I didn't need. I might could have lived with that..but he also talked me into giving him my battery that worked when right side up. I feel I was robbed!  I'm not sure what he did was legal ?? But I am Positive it was unethical. I don't know how the Better Business Bureau will feel about the employees basic theft of My property.. I haven't contacted them yet......

name: Val Hicks
text: I have been a customer of Vape Escape for a little over a year now and have never had a problem until recently. I have always had great customer service and shopping has always been a pleasant experience. I went into the bessemer store on Tuesday the 19th and had really bad customer service. The employee working yesterday was very rude and had a very bad attitude towards not only me but other customers as well. This was not my first experience with this sales associate. He treated me in the same manner last time and I even left a comment card in the comment box and seems like nothing has been done about this. I feel like this will be my last trip to Vape Escape. If the owner or manager or whoever is in charge of this employee cant fix the problem then I dont want to spend my money there. I dont feel I should be treated this way and wont be back while he is an employee.

resp.text: Val, I am sorry to hear about your experience. We pride ourself on customer service. We take comments like this very seriously and do everything in our power to remedy the situation. I would like to discuss the matter with you, but I could not find your name in our customer list. Please feel free to call me at 205-862-2306. Thanks, John Seale (owner)

resp.text: Amber I am sorry you feel that way. Was it the juice selection or the hardware selection that was not adequate? 2 Stars is pretty brutal just because we didn't have what you were looking for.

name: Jason Merrill
text: Small selection of juices, aways out of something or the wrong nic., lack of coils, lack of merchandise to choose from if you want to buy something new.

resp.text: Jason, I am sorry that we were not able to meet your needs. We carry over 85 different flavors of e-liquid. You must understand it is nearly impossible to keep 85 flavors and each nic level in stock all the time. When we are out of something, unlike most stores, we have the ability to restock from our local warehouse within 24 hours. As for coils, we stock over 30 different types of coils for many tanks and multiple manufactures. I wish we could carry all the coils, but the industry has generated too many different tanks to make that practical. We are not a vape super store so we do not try to carry everything. We focus on the newest quality products and strive to give the best customer service possible.

name: C J
text:
I urge everyone in the area to visit this shop if you need vape supplies, and especially premium e-juice. Not only is the owner very friendly, he is the ONLY store in town that cares enough about his customers to reflect that in his prices. I've visited all the local shops, and not only do none of them have the selection he does, none of them come close to the prices he sells his juice for. You can't even beat most of it online, especially when you factor in shipping.

Local businesses like this deserve our support and help. I hear a lot of people say they like to support local businesses, and that's good and all, but when I visit a lot of those businesses the prices are just so expensive that I can't afford to support them. I understand overheard and brick and mortar retail costs (I've worked retail all my life), but not having a price matching policy, not negotiating on price at all and having your e-juice marked up sometimes nearly double what it cost online is absurd. This place, I can truly say, deserves the support.

name: Jake AF
text: I've only ever purchased batteries and in-house juices from NAV. I was pleasantly surprised when I found out that they offer a 120mL sized bottle for $27.99, but I am sorry to say that I can only use about 30-50mL of the 120. For some reason, their juice hardens into a solid mass inside the bottle within a day of purchase. At first, I thought it must have been a bad mixing job or "batch," but I just noticed the same thing has happened again for my fourth bottle in a row. The price is attractive, and that's why I've continued to give it shot whenever I'm in town. However, it's just too frustrating to try and push whatever little juice remains in the bottle through a hardened mass that clogs the tip. For the amount of juice I can actually use, the price ends up being more expensive than high-end brands. They have a decent selection of hardware and accessories, but I'm going to steer clear of their juice selections from now on.

name: tfaith08
text:
Purchased roughly 30 bottles of juice over 4 months and had gotten on a first name basis with the employees. I've helped customers while in the store to assist with the workload, given information on sales from other stores, given all my information freely to them, waited very long periods of time behind other customers to keep them from leaving out of frustration, and offered to work to fill gaps in schedules. I'd made every attempt to be a good customer that I could muster.

I'd spent over $1000 on various purchases in total at this location, mostly on juice. Of those, 2 were of a new flavor that I tried in the shop. After opening the bottle, the flavor was incredibly different than what was used as a tester.

I returned to the store within 2 days with both bottles missing less than 5% of their original content and explained the problem, to which no attempt was made to rectify the problem.

I then tried the tester again (tasted great) and purchased a 3rd bottle as well as a previous favorite. The 3rd bottle of the juice was bad as well.

Upon my return trip, the no return policy was again enforced and I asked if they considered it to be a store problem that over $70 in juice that I'd recently purchased from them was useless, to which I was answered with "can't take anything back."  I asked if they had a new bottle of the same flavor since I suspected that the others were older (they were as later confirmed by the manufacturer).

I asked whether any attempt to rectify a future problem would be made if the 4th bottle was no good, to which I was given a simple "no." I asked whether any exceptions would be made since I'd made it known that there may be a problem, to which I was answered with "nope, no returns."

The last bottle was again bad. The manufacturer made it right. The store has not seen me since. I can walk to the store from my house in 5 minutes but now choose to drive to various locations in Mobile.

Juice was ok and battery works good but I'll never go back there again after the way I was treated. I'll buy online and save myself the poor service.

name: Margot Hamilton
text:
Concerning Spanish Fort Store:

Bought two batteries right before Thanksgiving and left town. Neither worked. I went to the store to take them back and get replacements after returning later and they would not accept the return. They said it was more than 10 days and the manufacturer will not accept the return. I explained I have been shopping there since the store opened. The clerk even called the regional manager, after I insisted, and she said the same. I told her I would tell everyone about this treatment and they have records of my patronage and purchases- probably amounting to thousands of dollars since they have opened. Plenty of purchases for myself and others over the years as well as referrals. No more, I will let everyone I now tell everyone they know to ban this store. The store lost thousands of dollars of income for about 40 bucks or less. Ignorant people. In addition, when I told the clerk one of the battery came apart - she asked if I had pulled it apart. She was implying I had caused the damage. Really!!!!!! The other battery simply never worked at all.

I have never felt pressured to buy anything, but they have always been happy to help. After just a few visits they got to know me and now when I go in they know what I want before I ask. Don't waste your time going anywhere else.
Update: I just realized it's been three years since I left my original review, and I am still using the last rig you guys sold me. Fantastic quality. Keep doing what you guys do! You're the best! Second Edit:Went in to buy a new rig this week. Got a great deal on an amazing vape. Aegis makes the toughest vales around. I manage a paint store and mine gets banged around a ton. But the Aegis rigs I've bought from you guys just never stop working. Only reason I wanted a new one is the paint and screen were so scratched up. Still worked fine. Again, thank you guys for being the best in the business!

resp.text: Peter, sorry about your experience in our store. Please understand the staff is under a strict guideline for handeling returns and defective hardware. As a general rule, we do not return defective coils due to the number of customer's abusing that option in the past. We make exceptions for coils that were purchased with in a day or two of being brought in or that when tested show they were never working properly. I would like to extend an offer to resolve the situation and earn your business back. Please contact me at the Alabaster store location at 205-719-9505. Thanks for your business. John Seale (owner)

name: Kenny Greg
text: I just recently, not even 15 mins, left the store to buy pipe tobacco. It’s a relatively cooler and rainy day here in Birmingham Al, with a hurricane coming this way, I decide to wear my hoodie to stay dry. I’ve walked into many different establishments before entering this one wearing my rain gear. Not one person disrespected me or treated me like I was insane for wearing things to keep the rain and cold off of me. When I finally entered the Standish meant, one of the persons within the store, was very helpful and considerate and help me find the products that I need. They treated me like a human and respected me. I thanked them for their help several times. When I went to check out was when everything changed. I was scolded for wearing a hoodie and not seeing a sign that says no hoodies by a gentleman and a blonde old lady. Granted if I had seen the sign, it would’ve told me right away what it truly means: No PoC. I wouldn’t have walked in and took my business elsewhere. This store is in a predominately PoC neighborhood and they band people from wearing hoodies, even on rainy days. That should tell you the type of people they dont want to enter their store, even though they are surrounded by nothing but PoC. I even went back inside and said how rude it is to treat people that way. I even bought stuff with my Navy Fed card, and they showed no respect, and talked down to me like I was a second rate citizen. I never been so humiliated for just trying to stay dry. Seriously I thought we got passed this when Trayvon Martin died but it’s Birmingham so I’m not surprised.

resp.text: Sorry you felt that way. Well if you come in to the shop you need to pull your hoody of your head. It’s for security purposes.

text: I was sold a vape pen from the display so that I could get the color I wanted (Thank you kind Woman) but once I got home, the button fell off. Oh well, that’s an honest mistake. I went back the next day and the same woman was working. I explained what happened and she took a look and quickly and without question replaced my pen. I get home, everything works fine, I go to charge said new pen, and voila, it won’t charge, the charge port is pushed up a bit and the charging light won’t charge. I felt bad about returning but I was impressed with the customer service. I went back, a man was working, I explained what happened and that I’d been here two days prior with similar issues. He told me the pen wasn’t working and it was my fault and there was nothing he could do. I asked for a replacement and he denied me and kept telling me it was my fault the pen was not working. He was short and rather rude with me and I won’t be purchasing anything else from him.

name: Stephen Fanning
text: Southern Vape has been a staple to vapers in the Clanton area for years now.  They were the first vape shop to open up in that area, and though others have come and gone, they remain.  This is due to their rotating variety of juices and hardware, and their excellent customer service.  They are always willing to go the extra mile to help you out, whether it is helping to pick out a juice, or pick the right device for your needs without overselling you something you don't need.  If you vape, and you live anywhere near Clanton, you already know how great of a place this is.  Don't miss out, definitely check this place out if you haven't already.

text: Great business,  friendly knowledgeable, and helpful staff. Always very patient and willing to go the extra mile for their customers.  I've even had them call their competition for me to find a product they didn't have that I wanted. I have never had any kind of complaint about this business. I've been to several different shops since I began vaping, but now this is the only place I go for my vaping needs. If you've never been here I highly recommend you give them a try. You won't regret it. As a matter of fact, when the staff learned about my home burning down not only did they go out of their way to make sure I had what I needed to continue vaping,  they also donated clothes for my family and allowed others to bring donations for us to their place of business. They are like a family and they really care about their customers.

name: g mail
text:
Good juice, mods and acc stock to shop.

Put me on a new brand and flavor juice. best tasting and quality been intro'd to since starting almost two years ago.
was it cheap? no.
there's always been and always will be much truth in the old adage... you pay for what you get.

told him what i'd been filling my tank with for a while. didn't have same make and model juice i'd been using. but in a couple quick mins he's got tasting a couple choices that are right in my wheelhouse. better even.

one of, if not the best shops from a whole package... juice, gear and often undervalued, but most important factor regardless of what business you're in... people... i've come across... clanton and afar.

and like the man told me people;

it's not smoke, it's vape!

name: Frank & Shamona parler
text:
Ripping teenagers off!
My 15 year old daughter decided to get her screen fixed on her own with her own money. She only had $80.00. The vape shop charged her $59.99 to repair her screen and it only took 30 minuets. He repaired her screen, but when she attempted to make a call. Her speaker or camera wasn’t working. My son went back up there to only receive the message that it would cost another $49.99 to repair. I called up there and asked him why would he take her money and not correctly fix her phone causing more problems than before. The man went on stating he didn’t break her speaker but the person prior to him who fixed her phone damaged her speaker and camera. Now prior to him fixing my daughters phone, my son fixed her screen 8months ago and everything worked fine. I relayed this information to him in hopes of him reopening her phone to find the problem. He again stated, he will not. It will cost another $49.99. I asked for the manager. He replied he’s the owner. I said so your not gonna do anything about not fixing my daughters phone correctly. He said no. Unless you pay $49.99, there’s nothing else I can do. I said sir, do you know you just crushed a 15 year old lil girls heart who tried to do the right thing on her own? As to what I thought, he gave No reply. I will never enter this store again!

resp.text: Dear customer, your daughter came with a broken screen and said she wants to fix, and that is what we did. We replaced her screen with a brand new screen. Like you mentioned and like we told you, someone already tried to fix the phone before and they cut off the camera wire. Therefore, its not working. The camera replacement is different from the screen replacement. Thank you.

name: Justin Brumble
text: I was visiting Dothan and left my pack of GENUINE smok coils in Pensacola. I went to this shop because it was close to where we were. I was sold an obviously clone coil. I have had experience with clones and the real coils so I know the difference. The machining is cheaper as well as the materials and the atomizer itself. The coil leaked and spit tons of juice in my mouth. The real coils will be right around 0.228 or 0.25 if they are genuine. This one was 0.281 and it started letting burnt juice back into my tank. I do not recommend this place and I am giving it one star because it was obviously cloned and it was very over priced. $5 for one coil? Come on.

resp.text:
We are sorry about your visit and your experiance. We appreciate your feed back, and have huge concerns over authenticity in our industry. We also know Smok is a mass produced brand.
Have you given us a chance to prove they are authentic by allowing us to scratch the code on the box and check?
We would be glad to provide this information. We guarantee our authenticity on products unless otherwise specified. We wish the best, and hopefully you'll allow us to prove that you are mistaken.

name: Addie Grace
text: Great place to visit for all of your tobacco needs, vape/juices, mods, U,-Haul, and all sorts of interesting items. You would usually just run into your local convenient store for just your usual pack of cigs, but with this store, you'll catch yourself somehow checking out the hats, shirts, jewelry, and everything else in between. I have been a long time customer (approx. 6-8yrs) of the Discount Tobacco store and I must say the customer service/cashier whose name is Nicole is amazingly nice and respectful. When it was just her and Smokey running the store,  those times were great and service was always 5 Stars, most definitely than any other store within this county. With Smokey no longer working there, I just hope they keep Nicole there because it wouldn't be the same without either 1 of them. I see them both as the backbone of this business and the reason it's as successful as it is today. With all of that being said, I highly recommend this Tobacco store to anyone looking for great deals on products along with being treated respectfully as a customer.

name: Liz Bozeman
text:
TRDL; if you don't want to read entire review:
if you need to go to a liquor store. DONT GO TO ABC OR ABC SPIRITS or whatever that place is called - thats on 231. I mean its good but so far NO liquor store has compared to this one. Just come here. TRUST. ME.

Full Review:
I just went here for the first time today. As in just left. I loved this place SO SO SO MUCH. I was telling myself I must do a review as soon as I get home. What this place has to offer is so much! I just bought soju from there! And it was not terribly price. The only place I could find it was at a Korean restaurant (that was called Kalim Garden. And I would buy unopened bottles from them. I also got 2 different bottles of sake. Which I couldn't be more happy about! There is White Claw here. They still have it in stock despite the fact that there is currently a shortage. The guy inside (I didn't get his name was so friendly. This is also a place you can get CBD & vape products. I actually bought a pack of prerolles hempettes. It looked like they have 4 brands to choose from. I have tried a lot of the hempette brands and listen to me!! - just buy the red pack. Stunna Bubba Kush. I have tried the other ones pure hemp is pretty good but there are a lot stems in it even tho they claim theres not, wild hemp brand is just...really tame. Flavor is worst than the "Pure Hemp" brand. So that's usually just what ive been forced to get around here. HOWEVER I am currently smoking one of these Stunnas. The flavor - very good. Would rate 4/5 bc its good but it is def no premium ish. Stem wise give a 3/5 I'm hearing tons of little pops.... But nothing like the Pure Hemp brand. Price I give 5/5 stars. This one was $13.99 I think. The other brands I have mentioned were $9.99. Which is typical but very decently priced compared to other hemp shops ive been to. So just pay the extra $4 for the red one if you are interested.

Also as for how the store looks and atmosphere wise - AMAZING. hate that google is a 5 star system bcuz that for sure is a 10 star - no 11 stars for the atmosphere of the place. Employee also seems to be very knowledgeable although I didnt have to ask many questions bc I knew what I was going for and know my alcohol. But they had things in there I have never tried before. So that excited me a lot.

I will be putting the TLDR at the top of my review as well in case no one reads this novella of a review. 😂 but if you need to go to a liquor store. DONT GO TO ABC OR ABC SPIRITS or whatever that place is called - thats on 231. I mean its good but so far NO liquor store has compared to this one. Just come here. TRUST. ME.

text: The young lady looked annoyed when I came in and her having to get up and put her mask on. She was VERY unconcerned with my needs and spoke in a short bothered manner. The products were WAY more limited than the Auburn location and the prices here were higher for some reason. I would have purchased more if she had of assisted me. Had I not been COMPLETELY out of nic juice, I would have gone to the other location when I went to work nearby that location tomorrow. The men at the Auburn location are always helpful and try to guide me to a decision. I will be ONLY going to that location going forward. I love the brand of Vapor Ville and I love the discounts but the Opelika store's customer service needs MAJOR assistance.

name: Moe Mazher
text: I go to this place on a regular basis. I'm glad I read the reviews about the girl with the gun. Super mean and rude. She snapped on me the last time I was there, then apologized and said she was having a bad day. I'm seriously considering to another place next time. Sucks cause the variety is pretty good there.

name: Csongor Szendrey
text: Wow, this place doesn't GAF. First time I went there, I spent about $80. Now mind you, it was $80 that could have been 3 times that but, the young lady. Not only was she rude & off-putting, she was vaguely threatening. When asked about a product, if given anything more than 3 contemptuous words, you were given nothing. I had to return an item, it was grudgingly exchanged & my receipt was confiscated, so if the device doesn't work I am just going to swallow the $15 rather than go back again. If you want to be barely talked to, & treated contemptuously by that woman with a gun by all means go here. Personally, I regret stepping in their a second time.

name: Kelroderick Pittman
text: This is my go to vape shop. AMAZING customer service and awesome mod/juice selection. Kendall is extremely helpful and gets the job done. I've been going there almost 2yrs now and I've had nothing but good experiences.

name: M. C.
text: The vibe here is ugh! You have to ask about pricing on each and every product! The girls behind the counter not friendly not helpful couldn't answer questions. Couldn't tell me much of anything. Just not a good place to start out I guess. Maybe ok if you know what you want. Just no a good fit for me. They do have a cheap bargain bin of old eliquid if you're broke I guess but old juice is AWFUL and I just rather not.

resp.text:
I'm sorry your experience wasnt top notch. We actually have everything out and priced, excluding ALL juices. So your right. However, you must have skipped over the menus we keep out for just this..you picking ejuice.
In that menu book has sizes and prices as well as brands and flavor profiles.
Our employee however should have tried harder and we do apologize for you not feeling like you got a 100% great service. We hope we get another chance one day, thank you for your time and review.

text:
Came by 15 minutes before they close, REALLY ready to buy something to replace a Juul, and the young lady behind the counter just seemed annoyed that I even came by..?

Asked her if she had something similar to the Juul (as I’m rather new to vaping), and she mumbled something like “yea, you can come back tomorrow and get it,” and continued to make it clear that she wasn’t too thrilled to see me.

Maybe (hopefully) she was just having a bad day, as we all do, but I’ll be spending my money elsewhere I reckon.

Note - The young lady mentioned above was proudly strapped with her firearm of choice, and for that, I would like to give her 5 stars  🤘

The shelf was to far back so i couldn't read any labels to help myself. Ended up buying something I didn't really like.

name: Tammy M Cooper
text: I was sold some expired juice today and Annie was the rudest clerk I’ve ever encountered when I called in to ask what could be done about this error. I work third shift and she said that I would have to come by the store when I get off and wait till ten when they opened because she couldn’t drive one mile to Tiger town and leave me a fresh bottle at my job so I could enjoy it when I got to work tonight. This was the only option she had because she wasn’t able to find  where Tiger town was because she would get lost. I’m sad that I even expected some thing any more than the disrespect I’ve recently gotten from the store I was a fan of. I wish I could have given it a zero rating simply due to her selfish and lack of concern for the money I spend there regularly. I’ll take my money and my health concerns due to expired merchandise elsewhere and hopefully all who read this will do the same. It’s doesn’t take much to show appreciation but you can show disrespect in the blink to an eye.

text: Very, very great store. I bought a device and had some problems with it. They worked very hard to make it right! I will NOT go anywhere else for any of my vaping needs. Thank you Jonathan. The comments below are probably people who are impossible to please.

name: Scott Simmons
text: My girlfriend was a pack-a-day smoker until she started vaping. Chelsea at Eco Smoke Whitesburg helped her move from her cigarette habit to vaping with expert advice, product knowledge, and genuine customer care. Go see Chelsea. She's the best!

name: Dresden Lafferty
text: This place is a mixed bag. When you walk in you're to take a number. The staff is very prompt at acknowledging you and letting you know they will get to you ASAP. The store is clean, open and understated with generic all art and a singe sofa against the wall. That being said, this is not a hang out vape shop. The staff is friendly enough, informative and polite. But you won't get ide chit chat from them or any joking around. The (female) manager at this location never smiles that I've seen. She has a personality/speaking tone that reminds me of Wednesday Addams. If you're looking for a clean, professional and to the point shop to get in and out with no frills or witty banter. This is the shop for you. If there was a "high end" side to vapor shops, catering to the business professional then it would be this place. Right down to the polo shirt and kaki pants. All in all its a fine place to go if you're not looking for a more at home feeling type store.

name: Ryan Hammond (SaylemDaemonia)

name: Christian Broadway
text: Had a problem at the whitesburg store with a bad Atomizer that i got and tried to return to Jonathan. His customer service skills were terrible and only made the problem worse so i called and talk to the manager , Chelsea who was able to fix my problem and keep me as a customer. Ive decided to only go back on Jonathan's days off to avoid future issues with him since ive had more than one .

name: Bethany Folse
text: The first time I went into eco smoke on whitesburg, I was pretty pleased with the service I received. The second time I went, the service wasn't bad, but these guys act like you are wasting their time. The third time I went, I bought a new battery from Chelsea. She is a delight. If you go into eco smoke, look for Chelsea. She is the only one that doesn't seem to be perturbed by your presence. I went a fourth time and bought a tank that was of lesser value than the one I had because they were out of the one I needed. The tank I bought broke within hours of buying it. When I went back into the store with my broken tank and my receipt to inquire about return policies, the gentlemen spitefully says, "you'll have to talk to my manager about that one." All of the guys that work there are rude. As someone who works in the customer service industry I've learned, it doesn't hurt to smile once in a while and it doesn't hurt to make people feel like you care. To the employees at eco smoke, with the exception of Chelsea, cheer up. Your jobs aren't that hard.

name: Debra Muse
text:
As an older female smoker I’ve always felt out of place at most vape shops. Every time I go into one I either feel like I’m not being taken seriously or that the young gentlemen behind the counter didn’t quite understand where I was coming from. I travel for work so I’m in and out of these shops a lot and let me say this is the first time I’ve ever felt at home in a vape store.

The young man Chance assisted me with the kind of customer service you don’t find anymore. He made me feel comfortable while being so knowledgeable about the product that I left feeling like I could teach others how to use the product. He made sure I knew the ins and outs of every detail of my device before I left. He even told me if I had any questions at all while traveling just to call and ask for him and he would continue to assist me.

I truly wish I could leave 6 stars because this is the best vape shop in the country hands down.

Chance was an absolute sweetheart and I look forward to the next time I’m in town for work to stop by this shop again!

name: Courtney Foster Wallace
text: Absolutely love love love LOVE THIS FREAKING PLACE. They make you feel like family the moment you walk into their doors. They say they will take care of you and they keep their word. They hook you up big time. I have known the owners since day one when they opened their store. The greatest people ever this is a must visit place for all your vaping needs weather you are a vet in the vaping world or new to it all by the time you leave you will know it all. Heath and Star are wonderful people and I'm so lucky to call them friends.

name: Holly Stiles
text: If you wanna quit smoking, this place can help. The staff will answer any question, they'll help you get started, they're honest about which products are better than others. They have great deals. And the best juice in the state. When I started coming here they had 2 locations. This store and one in Woodstock. They've now grown to 5 stores, adding Tuscaloosa, Birmingham, and Gulf Shores. There's one reason they keep growing- EVERYONE loves their juices. Amazing flavors, and the staff is better than any vape store you've ever walked in to. Places like "Vape Escape" have too formal of an atmosphere. Vapor Magic will make you feel like family. They do whatever they can to make their customers happy. Great Prices. And the owner is truly a good person. He doesn't just sit back and collect money like most business owners do, he's involved, he's there and he cares about his company, his employees, and his customers. Don't give those corporate vape stores your money any longer, give it to a company that truly appreciates your business.

name: Lindsey Eastwood
text: Great shop! Very friendly and informative. Could not ask for a better shopping experience. My brother, husband, and I went to this location in search of a Christmas gift for my mom to help her quit smoking...One months later, my mom is vaping 50% of the time, and my brother quit smoking completely (previously smoking 1 pack per day) and now vapes full time. Cannot say enough positive things about Heath. He knows and believes in his product, and he was not “salesy” at all. If you or your family member is considering smoking, stop by this shop. It’s worth your time to at least learn more about this option for smoking cessation. PS. I never write reviews, ever.

name: daniel johnson
text: Very helpful and honest and friendly staff. I would recommend this store to anyone looking for a friendly and convenient store. They have everything to get you on your way to quiting smoking or upgrading to something new. They don't sell a real high mg nic but most ppl don't use that high. If you use one of those cheap store bought pen mods then you might but in a mod you really don't need but a 6mg. I smoked 2 packs a day and I quit within a week of starting to vape. Now some shops do sell them and if needed they can get you higher mg juice but if you use it in an actual mid you aren't gonna like it very much. Every shop is gonna get and bad reviews,I suggest you go check them out. Everyone has an opinion and you should go of your own opinion. Mine is to check them out. I give them a thumbs up.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Jess Goodwin
text: I posted a negative review about a month ago and have since deleted it because i now understand. I quit smoking with a pen, was using 28 mg of nicotine and was fine. Totally didnt understand why anyone would only sell 12mg or lower!! Now, i have gotten a better vape, it hits harder and is alot different and im now on 10mg. I judged too quickly and was rude. That was wrong and based on my lack of knowledge and having a bad day. I would like to change my review and say that this place seems awesome, the people are friendly and I feel awful for being such an a**!!

resp.text: I'm sorry you feel that way. There is a reason I only carry juice up to 12mg but for people who come in wanting higher... I do order it for them in a juice that can be ordered higher than 12. The average mg of nicotine in a cigarette is 12. The highest is 20. I have helped many people to stop using cigarettes and switch to vaping. So again I am sorry you didn't like our store.

text: Love this place, It opened in May 2019 and I heard about it right away.. I didn't have a car so I walked there.. He offered me water and a place to sit till I cooled off.. I quit smoking 5 years ago after 35 years and have tapered down to low mg nicotine.. His shop is full of everything a vape girl needs.. (CBD oil really helps my MS and it comes in vape juice)... CBD Gummies, CBD HONEY Styx and more.. Collection of cool knives, Zippo's, Torches, Vape Juice, Vape Pens,  disposable pods, Salt something or other juice and smokers and pretty glassware too....I go a lot now that I have a car.. Thank The Lord...

name: defabricational a last name
text: I was very happy with this company until I recently tried to return a defective part. Thursday I bought a new atomizer and was thrilled to find the prices only about double what I would pay online via mad-vapes. Unfortunately what I also found was a lack of accountability and responsibility on the part of eco smoke. The atomizer has a bad seal on the bottom of the tank causing a constant slow leak. This caused me to go through a full work day without nicotine and with sticky hands. Upon trying to return the item they flat refused citing their policy listed on the wall. My question is whether or not it's worth 9.99 to sell a defective product and refusing to correct the situation thus causing your customer base to do business elsewhere? Do you, eco smoke really have what it takes to survive on hit and run sales? I don't think so. I'll be taking my business elsewhere.

name: Pixel Hobo
text:
The Positives: Clean store. Somewhat of a knowledgeable staff. Lastly, offers items that can help you get off smoking and into vaping.

The Negatives: WAY overpriced, and I mean double and sometimes triple what you can find elsewhere. I understand you're in the business to make money but to price gouge people that don't know better? Not the type of business I would trust putting my faith into. If you'd try to be competitive in your prices you'd probably have more return customers that were satisfied instead of feeling as if they'd been violated once they started to look at the web for information.

The other negative is the snobbish staff I've hand to endure. I've been to their store twice and here's the skinny. First time was when the shop opened up within two months. The girlfriend got me their "$99" special starter kit that I later looked up and she could have bought the same thing from the internet for a mere $35 WITH shipping. The first time I went there was I went totally dry on my cartomisers and had to cough up double the price for something I SHOULD have kept in inventory from the internet but hey, my loss their gain. When I was buying this, I had to listen to a couple of the staff dealing with customers while the employee that was dealing with me went to the back to find my goods. I understand trying to get someone new to vaping but why try to sell a beginner basically a hookah setup? hahaha. The last time I was in there I had to burn some time waiting on some a Chili's and went into the store. This time I just went in browsing, not showing any signs of being a vapor user. Well, it was a train wreck. Try selling me either the "special" which is overpriced, or try to get me to buy a high end hookah cloud chasing machine, which is way overpriced.

So, in the end, if you want to be bent over a pretty counter having your wallet violated all the while having them whisper how their hookah is sweet then you've hit the jackpot. Go elsewhere.

I would recommend the addition of a tasting bar. Every time I have bought juice without being able to try it in a vape has ended up being a waste of money. If they can do that, then the store would be worth 5 stars.

name: Bradley Sanders
text: Long story short I ended up making two trips to this place in one day with nothing to show for besides a $20 refund to my account. They failed to check the proper size of the product I wanted to make sure it would fit. When I went back the 2nd time they sadly would not sell me the product I needed bc apparently those can only be sold along with a $45 product as a “bundle”. They should have checked the size the first time and I would have gone to the other store where I found my product later for $6. They don’t care about returning customers but the vape shop down the road from there now has my business.

name: Jason McPherson
text:
I have been a customer at this store for years. As long as i have been vaping i have purchased all my products here. I have purchased 3 mods multiple replacement tanks and hundreds of coils.
I had never had an issue until today. My wife purchased my vape fluid for me while in Dothan. When i filled my vape there was obviously something wrong with the flavor. It tasted wrong when vaped and smelled bad when exhaled. This is obviously not the stores fault as they sell sealed packages from the manufacturer.
The issue is when my wife called the store. The young man that answered the phone acted confused and hesitant to help. Christian advised my wife that she and I had just become use to the fluid making the taste and odor of the vapor smell bad instead of like caramel. We compared it to the previous empty bottle of fluid and could smell a difference. At this point Christian agreed to take the bottle back and give us a new bottle.
When arriving at the store Christian was confrontational telling my wife that he "wasn't even supposed to take product back" and he was "losing money trying to help us out." He refused to help my wife open the new bottle to check and see if it smelled correct, and repeatedly expressed how much money he was losing.
Well he lost a customer the store has had for years.

text: Went here yesterday to try and find why my Vape was leaking. I got there about 15 minuets before closing time but didn’t think it to be an issue because I knew it wouldn’t take long. I thought I remembered one of the employees say it was dangerous and they needed to be properly wrapped.  I asked the guy if it was dangerous and he just barely looked and replied yea it’s not great.  Asked if they carried a specific juice, was told no and he didn’t try and suggest anything nor did he offer for me to try any juices. First experience there was great. Not this time! name: B R
text:
Went in the other day and said I️ wanted q2 coils. I️ didn’t know there was more than one kind, and they didn’t even care to tell me. Went back today and the woman told me they don’t do exchanges or returns on coils even though they’re unopened and said it’s not her fault even though I️ remained respectful.
Edit: To the owner responding that never happened, I’m not sure if this is the woman who actually helped me or if someone else owns the store, but the conversation went as follows;
“Hey Can I get some q2 coils?”
“Uhh let me check the back and make sure we have some”
End of the talk about coils then we talked about juice. And okay so on the receipt after I purchase your product it says I can’t return it! There’s a slight dillema there I have to purchase the product first, now I understand that you must defend your store, but do not lie and say you’re employees did something else when they did not.

resp.text: The sales attendant asked you if your baby was bottom airflow or top airflow. You responded that it was bottom airflow, which inferred that the tank was either a baby beast or big baby beast. We are not responsible for incompatible coils when customers do not bring their tank in to verify correct coil compatibility. It is not our fault when customers don't know what tank they use. Your receipt even states coils cannot be returned.

text: I am very upset that I bought my first vape here, I bought the smok 8 stick. Was about $60 this vape lasted me 37 days. But they didnt suggest I exchange it when it was within their return policy window. They didnt want or offer to help me and Im very disappointed that they didnt offer me to exchange, or get a new one and return the defective one to smok.He just let me leave and said “theres nothing I can do to help”. 😕 I suggest going to other vape stores who apprecoate your business. Because I bought many coils, and juice here as well. I never changed any of the coils myself I went to this store to have every coil replaced so I took good care of it. Very upset.

name: Angela Wood Trejo
text: I bought a vape pen 22 from Sam about 5 months ago and he put EVERYTHING together for me and by the time I needed to change my coil it was so hard to get top off,but once I changed the coil and went to put top back on it would NOT stay on because it was stripped out BAD!!!! I took it back up there so it could be fixed which I was going to pay for and now its been 5 MONTHS back and forth to Oneonta from LF and once I get there he can't find the part but tells me to leave my name and number which I have many times. Well I called up there to find out how much a different vape was vs where I was at and of course they were higher and he starts to tell me:We give 20% discount and warranty our stuff and that's when I said well WHY? have you not fixed my vape pen 22 and he said well you bring in and I'm fix for you,so I took it up there and all of a sudden its we only warranty certain things and I said NO your gonna fix it and he starts trying to sell me another one for half price and I said why should I have to buy another when I have this one and then he drops my vape and busts my glass and I said well looks like your gonna have to put a new glass now and he says no problem its only $10 dollars for me. Well I've spent more than that in gas to and from for you to fix something and NEVER gets fixed. So I tell him I talked to someone from a vape shop in Cullman and he says that's my cousin,so I called and the man from Cullman and he  says I'm not related to him,then ask to speak to him but before wanted me to drive to Cullman to get the part and me bring him the receipt for him to give me my money back. That's NOT MY PLACE!!!! Well the guy from Cullman got Sam the part and I had to go back to Oneonta AGAIN to get the part and I told him I needed a new coil as well and he said I'm give you the new update coil and he puts EVERYTHING back together for me once again plus some juice and says you need to charge it. It's been charging since last night and I went to check it and it want even come on now and it's leaking oil from bottom of glass into the button. DO NOT BUY ANYTHING FROM THIS GUY. He needs to make things right and fix my vape or give me another cause that's not fair that I have a messed up vape now that don't even work. How can you expect ppl to continue to come back and do business when you can't fix a issue from the beginning...... If I could I would have only rated a half star but only the one option! 😤😤😠👿

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review, Kim.  Our goal is that no customer has an unreasonable wait time when shopping.  Store traffic varies, and we do our best to have staff available to ensure little or no wait time.  Last year, we even added another register to further reduce customer wait time.  As we continue to grow, we are committed to keeping our promise to customers. That is, to provide customers with the absolute best service available & 100% satisfaction. We greatly appreciate your input. We hope that you'll come see us again and allow us a chance to serve you better - and more promptly - so that next time we can earn a 5-star review!

name: Brent_ MiserWannaBe_3thousandX
text: Do not buy any Vaping hardware from this store. They will not Honor the manufacturer warranty. I bought a Smoke Novo here, the firing switch went out in just under 2 months. The Smok website instructs the buyer to return it for an exchange at the place of purchase if it is under 6 months old. Athens Smoke Shop refused to honor Smok's replacement program. Now I have to spend money on shipping and go without my pod system for a week. All Athens Smoke Shop had to do was make a call to have the unit replaced that they would of exchanged my faulty unit with. The other 2 main Vapor shops in Athens, Leet Vapors and Kick'n My Habit Vaps, honor the warranty. That's where I'll go for every Vap need for now on.
